Name: Gin Garden
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of float 3 cucumber slices.
MUDDLE cucumber in base of shaker.
Review: A veritable English shrubbery with flowers, fruit and vegetables flourishing in harmony.
History: Adapted from a drink that Dan Warner at Zander and Tobias Blazquez Garcia at Steam collaborated on in London, England, in 2001.
